analyzed: de dag gi khyad par ni phyir rol na gnas pa rnams kyi tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal nyams dga' ba gang yin pa de dag de'i bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do // de nas lha'i dbang pos thams cad ma lus par bstan nas rdo shin tu gsal ba las sa gzhi byas pa /
translated: The difference between them and the delightful groves and parks of those who live outside is that the latter are not even a sixteenth as good.🔽Then, after the Lord of the Gods has shown them everything, they go to the place where the ground is made of clear crystal

original: lhag par nyams dga' ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ga la ba der 'dong bar byed @330a *//
analyzed: lhag par nyams dga' ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ga la ba der 'dong bar byed @330a *//

analyzed: do; ;bee d'urya'i khang bzang ka ba stong yod la padma r'a ga'i lan kan bres pa /

analyzed: chur dpag tshad lnga yod pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mdzad pa yin no //
translated: This is the magical creation of the Blessed Kāśyapa.

original: de nas brgya byin khang bzang rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis brgyan pa de la lha de rnams dang lhan cig der 'dzegs pa dang / khang bzang de la bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan sprul pa gang yin pa de la /
analyzed: de nas brgya byin khang bzang rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyis brgyan pa de la lha de rnams dang lhan cig der 'dzegs pa dang / khang bzang de la bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan sprul pa gang yin pa de la /
translated: Then Śakra, together with the gods, ascends to that palace adorned with staircases of the seven precious substances.

analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyid chos ston pa yin no snyam du sems so //

analyzed: de nas brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan de la mgo bos phyag btsal te /

analyzed: lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig shin tu gus par gyur pa'i yid kyis phyag btsal nas /

analyzed: 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa / rab tu grol ba skyob mdzad cing // zhi ba dang ni thar pa'i sgo //

analyzed: 'byed par mdzad pa 'jig rten mgon //

original: de yi gzugs brnyan 'di bzhugs so //
analyzed: de yi gzugs brnyan 'di bzhugs so //

original: mi gang zhi ba'i yid kyis su //
analyzed: mi gang zhi ba'i yid kyis su //
translated: Whoever, with a peaceful mind,

analyzed: 'di la rtag tu phyag btsal na //
translated: Always bows to this,

original: de ni srid pa'i 'jig las mthar //
analyzed: de ni srid pa'i 'jig las mthar //
translated: Will reach the end of the world of becoming

analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa'ang rtogs par 'gyur // mya ngan 'das grong ston mdzad pa //

analyzed: chos 'di gsung ba gang yin pa //

original: de ni zhi ba mchog tu dga'//
analyzed: de ni zhi ba mchog tu dga'//
translated: Is the most peaceful, supremely blissful,

analyzed: de ni mtha' las byung zhes bya // skyes bu brtan po rtsal po ches //
translated: And is called the one who has gone beyond the extremes.🔽If one relies on his words

translated: With a steadfast and powerful mind,🔽One will attain the state of permanence,

analyzed: rtag pa'i gnas ni 'thob par 'gyur //

original: skyes bu de nyid sems pa po //
analyzed: skyes bu de nyid sems pa po //

analyzed: sgrol byed 'di la brten nas su // srid gsum rgya mtsho chu bo'i klong //

analyzed: mi bzad 'jigs las sgrol bar byed //

analyzed: 'di ni me yi nang na mchog /

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs dri ma yis //

analyzed: mi rnams sems la sdig bcas pa //

original: khyu mchog de'i bka' ye shes chus //
analyzed: khyu mchog de'i bka' ye shes chus //
translated: The water of the knowledge of that best of men

original: dag pa nyid tu 'khru bar mdzad //
analyzed: dag pa nyid tu 'khru bar mdzad //

analyzed: mu stegs shes pa'i nga rgyal can // kun gyis gnas gang ma mthong ba //
translated: The tirthikas, who are proud of their knowledge,🔽Do not see the place

analyzed: gnas de khyod kyi dri ma med //

original: gsung rnams kyis ni mi la bstan //
analyzed: gsung rnams kyis ni mi la bstan //

analyzed: skye bo shin tu bag med pa //

analyzed: 'di dag mgon po khyed kyis bsgral /

analyzed: skye bo gzhan yang sgrol bar mdzad //

analyzed: skye bo kun la sman slad du //

analyzed: khyod nyid gcig pur zhugs par bas //
translated: You alone have entered.🔽You alone are the best of men,

analyzed: phan med rnams la phan mdzad phyir; ;khyod nyid kho na mi mchog lags //

original: de ltar brgya byin des gzugs brnyan de la bstod cing /
analyzed: de ltar brgya byin des gzugs brnyan de la bstod cing /
translated: In this way, Shakra praised that reflection and

original: gus par phyag btsal /
analyzed: gus par phyag btsal /

analyzed: lha thams cad dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs brnyan sprul pa de la mngon par phyag btsal /
translated: Together with all the gods, he also bowed to the reflection emanated by the Blessed One.

analyzed: na bza' chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa thags su ma btags pa gang yin pa de la'ang lha rnams mgo bos phyag @331a *//

analyzed: btsal te / gzugs brnyan de mthong nas yang rgyags pa nyid yongs su nyams par gyur to //
translated: When they saw this reflection, their arrogance was completely destroyed.

analyzed: de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mdzad pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa ji lta bur bzhugs pa de lta bur brgya byin gyis 'bum gyi char yang mi phod na /
translated: Śakra could not match even a hundred-thousandth of the Blessed One’s magical display.

original: lha gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos /🔽de nas brgya byin gyis rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i gzugs brnyan de mthong nas; ;de nas yang lha de rnams la phan par bya ba dang / lha bag med pas myos pa rnams bag med pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: lha gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos / de nas brgya byin gyis rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i gzugs brnyan de mthong nas; ;de nas yang lha de rnams la phan par bya ba dang / lha bag med pas myos pa rnams bag med pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: What need is there to speak of the other gods?

analyzed: las kyi dra ba skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo rdzu 'phrul byas pa de bstan to //
translated: Then, in order to benefit the gods and to free the careless gods from their carelessness, Śakra showed them the magical display of the net of karma, birth, and death.

original: de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin la smras pa /
analyzed: de nas lha de rnams kyis brgya byin la smras pa /
translated: Then the gods said to Śakra:

original: lha'i dbang po /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po /
translated: “Lord of the gods,

analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das des shing s'a la zung 'di'i nang du las kyi dra ba skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo 'di sprul pa mdzad la /
translated: the Blessed One has created this magical display of birth and death in the interior of this pair of sāla trees,🔽but not outside.

original: slad rol du ci'i slad du ma mdzad /
analyzed: slad rol du ci'i slad du ma mdzad /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar nga'ang de la ngo mtshar cher skyes te /
analyzed: 'di ltar nga'ang de la ngo mtshar cher skyes te /
translated: I too am greatly astonished by this.

original: de nas lha des nga rgyags pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bstan to //
analyzed: de nas lha des nga rgyags pa dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bstan to //
translated: Then the god revealed this in order to free me from my intoxication.

original: de nyid la ngas dris pa dang des smras pa /
analyzed: de nyid la ngas dris pa dang des smras pa /
translated: When I asked him about it, he said:

analyzed: 'di ltar 'di rtag tu mthong ba dang / skye bo thams cad ngo mtshar cher skyes te /
translated: ‘Because this is always seen, and because all people are greatly astonished by it,

analyzed: de ngo mtshar che bar rig nas 'jigs par bya ba dang / dad par bya ba dang / dad par bya ba'i phyir rgyu 'dis na bcom ldan 'das des phyi rol du sprul pa ma mdzad do //
translated: knowing that it is astonishing, in order to frighten them, to inspire faith in them, and to inspire devotion, for this reason the Blessed One has not created a magical display outside.’

original: phyi rol du sprul pa mdzad na ni skye bo kun gyis yang dang / yang du mthong @331b zhing /
analyzed: phyi rol du sprul pa mdzad na ni skye bo kun gyis yang dang / yang du mthong @331b zhing /
translated: If he were to manifest externally, everyone would see him again and again.

original: phan ma thogs la gzugs brnyan de zhig par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: phan ma thogs la gzugs brnyan de zhig par yang 'gyur te /
translated: And that reflection would be destroyed without having been of any benefit.

original: rgyu 'dis na shing s'a la zung gi nang du sprul pa 'di mdzad cing /
analyzed: rgyu 'dis na shing s'a la zung gi nang du sprul pa 'di mdzad cing /
translated: For this reason, he manifested this emanation within the pair of sāla trees.

original: shing s'a la zung gi nang du ngo mtshar che ba'i sprul pa gnyis mdzad do //
analyzed: shing s'a la zung gi nang du ngo mtshar che ba'i sprul pa gnyis mdzad do //
translated: And within the pair of sāla trees, he manifested two wondrous emanations.

original: gang skye bo kun gyis blta bar mi bya ba'i rgyu 'dis na bcom ldan 'das des shing ljon pa'i nang du skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba'i sprul pa 'di mdzad do //
analyzed: gang skye bo kun gyis blta bar mi bya ba'i rgyu 'dis na bcom ldan 'das des shing ljon pa'i nang du skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba'i sprul pa 'di mdzad do //
translated: For the reason that this should not be seen by everyone, that Blessed One manifested this emanation of birth and death within the pair of trees, a net of karma.

original: de nas brgya byin las lha rnams kyis de skad thos nas ngo mtshar che'o snyam pa dang bral nas /
analyzed: de nas brgya byin las lha rnams kyis de skad thos nas ngo mtshar che'o snyam pa dang bral nas /
translated: Then, having heard this from Śakra, the gods thought, “How wondrous!” and their amazement vanished.

original: de nas yang skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba de khang bzang dpag tshad lnga pa'i rtsig ngos dag la bris pa de dag rab tu bstan par brtsams so //
analyzed: de nas yang skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i ngo bo las kyi dra ba de khang bzang dpag tshad lnga pa'i rtsig ngos dag la bris pa de dag rab tu bstan par brtsams so //
translated: Then, he began to show them the nature of birth and death, the net of karma, painted on the walls of the five-league-tall palace.

original: de la re zhig dang por srog gcod pa rnams kyi gnas kyang sngar bstan pa bzhin /
analyzed: de la re zhig dang por srog gcod pa rnams kyi gnas kyang sngar bstan pa bzhin /
translated: First, the places of those who have killed are as previously explained.

original: gnod pa'ang sngar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gnod pa'ang sngar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar te /

original: sems can dmyal ba yang sos 'khor bcu drug pa sprul to //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba yang sos 'khor bcu drug pa sprul to //

original: de nas thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If, after being released from there, they are born among the pretas,

original: shin tu phrag dog can dang / shin tu khro bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: shin tu phrag dog can dang / shin tu khro bar 'gyur la /
translated: they will be very jealous and very angry.

original: de gzhan gyis mtshon cha rnam pa du ma dag gis gsod par byed do //
analyzed: de gzhan gyis mtshon cha rnam pa du ma dag gis gsod par byed do //
translated: Others will kill them with many kinds of weapons.

original: de nas las kyi dra bas 'brel ba dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas las kyi dra bas 'brel ba dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If, connected by the net of karma, they are born among the animals,

original: de sha za ba'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la; de sha'i don du mtshon cha dag gis bsad nas za bar byed do //
analyzed: de sha za ba'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la; de sha'i don du mtshon cha dag gis bsad nas za bar byed do //
translated: they will be born in a place where they eat meat, and they will be killed and eaten by weapons for the sake of meat.

original: de bzhin du sha rjen za ba seng ge dang / stag dag gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la shin tu mi sdug pa de @332a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du sha rjen za ba seng ge dang / stag dag gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur la shin tu mi sdug pa de @332a *//
translated: Likewise, you will be born as a lion or a tiger that eats raw meat.🔽

original: mtshon chas gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshon chas gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, those who eat raw meat will be born as lions and tigers, and will be killed by weapons.

original: de nas shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas shi nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: Then, when they die, if they are born among humans,

original: de shin tu 'thab mo byed pa 'khrug pa la dga' la sems bde bar mi gnas pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de shin tu 'thab mo byed pa 'khrug pa la dga' la sems bde bar mi gnas pa kho na yin te /
translated: they will be very quarrelsome, fond of fighting, and will not remain in a state of mental ease.

original: de mtshon gyis bsad nas tshe thung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de mtshon gyis bsad nas tshe thung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be killed by weapons and will have a short life.

original: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las 'ga' zhig gis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las 'ga' zhig gis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If, due to some karma to be experienced in other lives, they are born among the gods,

original: de bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs rnams nyams par 'gyur la tshe thung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs rnams nyams par 'gyur la tshe thung bar 'gyur te /
translated: their size, complexion, and shape will be inferior, and they will have a short life.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin gyi yul du gsod par 'gyur ba de dag gi rnam pa rtsig ngos dag la snang ngo //
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin gyi yul du gsod par 'gyur ba de dag gi rnam pa rtsig ngos dag la snang ngo //
translated: These forms of being killed by gods and asuras will appear on the walls.

original: de nas srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan thig nag 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
analyzed: de nas srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po gzhan thig nag 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
translated: Then, he sees the other great hell of sentient beings, which is the result of killing and stealing, called “Black Line,” with sixteen surrounding hells, as explained previously.

original: de nas shi nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas shi nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If, after dying in that hell, he is born among the hungry ghosts,

original: de snga ma bzhin du mtshon gyis gsod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de snga ma bzhin du mtshon gyis gsod par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will be killed by weapons, as before.

original: gal te res 'ga' yang mi gsod pa'am /🔽gzhan zhig gam /
analyzed: gal te res 'ga' yang mi gsod pa'am / gzhan zhig gam /
translated: If he is not killed by weapons,

original: de dang mthun pa zhig srog 'tsho ba'i don du rnyed na /
analyzed: de dang mthun pa zhig srog 'tsho ba'i don du rnyed na /
translated: or if he finds another way to survive,

original: de yi dvags gzhan gyis yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad phye mar brlags nas 'phrog par byed do //🔽de rgyu des shi nas gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de bya khug rta'am /
analyzed: de yi dvags gzhan gyis yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad phye mar brlags nas 'phrog par byed do // de rgyu des shi nas gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de bya khug rta'am /
translated: then other hungry ghosts will pulverize all his major and minor body parts and carry them off.

original: 'brog dgon pa chu dang bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brog dgon pa chu dang bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If, due to that cause, he dies and is born among the animals, he will be born as a bird or in a remote wilderness without water.

original: bkres pa dang / skom pas gdungs pa'i lus de nas kyang shi nas gal te mi @332b rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: bkres pa dang / skom pas gdungs pa'i lus de nas kyang shi nas gal te mi @332b rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: When they die and leave that body, which is tormented by hunger and thirst, they may be born among humans.🔽However, they will be born in a poor family in a country that is afflicted by war,

original: dbul po de yul mtshon gyis 'khrug pa'am /🔽lo nyes byung bar skye bar 'gyur te /🔽mtshon gyis 'chi ba'am /
analyzed: dbul po de yul mtshon gyis 'khrug pa'am / lo nyes byung bar skye bar 'gyur te / mtshon gyis 'chi ba'am /
translated: or in a country that is afflicted by famine.🔽They will die by the sword

original: ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or by starvation.

original: gang gi tshe res 'ga' yang bza' ba zhig rnyed na de gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed la zos na'ang 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe res 'ga' yang bza' ba zhig rnyed na de gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed la zos na'ang 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they happen to find something to eat, others will steal it from them. Even if they manage to eat something, they will not be able to digest it.

original: de nas shi nas kyang gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas shi nas kyang gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: When they die and leave that body, they may be born among the gods.

original: de'i lus dang / bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs de dag dman par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i lus dang / bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs de dag dman par 'gyur ro //
translated: However, their body, size, complexion, and shape will be inferior.

original: bdud rtsi'ang skyon dang bcas par las kyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: bdud rtsi'ang skyon dang bcas par las kyis 'byung ste /
translated: Their nectar will also be defective due to their karma.

original: de lha gzhan rnams kyi drung du shin tu ngo tsha bas skyengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lha gzhan rnams kyi drung du shin tu ngo tsha bas skyengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be extremely ashamed and embarrassed in the presence of the other gods.

original: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'ang mi snyan par 'gyur la tshe thung bar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'ang mi snyan par 'gyur la tshe thung bar yang 'gyur te /
translated: Even the five types of musical instruments will sound unpleasant to them and their lives will be short.

original: de ltar lha rnams kyis las kyis byas pa'i sprul pa de mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar lha rnams kyis las kyis byas pa'i sprul pa de mthong ngo //
translated: In this way, the gods see the emanations created by karma.

original: de nas yang brgya byin dang lha rnams kyis /
analyzed: de nas yang brgya byin dang lha rnams kyis /
translated: Then Śakra and the gods

original: sems can dmyal ba bsdus gzhom der las kyi rnam pa srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spyad pas skye bar 'gyur ba 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba bsdus gzhom der las kyi rnam pa srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spyad pas skye bar 'gyur ba 'khor bcu drug pa sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
translated: see the sixteen types of beings born in the Saṃghata hell as a result of their having engaged in killing, stealing, and sexual misconduct, as previously described.

original: de nas thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If they escape from there, they may be born among the pretas.

original: de tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing res 'ga' srog gzungs kyi zas rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyis phrogs la /
analyzed: de tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing res 'ga' srog gzungs kyi zas rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyis phrogs la /
translated: Even if they find food and drink that sustains their lives, others will steal it from them.

original: yi dvags skyugs pa za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi dvags skyugs pa za ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be born among the pretas who eat vomit.

original: de'i chung ma gang yin pa de de'i mngon sum du yi dvags gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed la /
analyzed: de'i chung ma gang yin pa de de'i mngon sum du yi dvags gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed la /
translated: His wife is right there, but other hungry ghosts steal her away.

original: @333a *// de mtshon cha blangs nas mtshon gyis btab ste gsod par byed do //
analyzed: @333a *// de mtshon cha blangs nas mtshon gyis btab ste gsod par byed do //
translated: He takes up a weapon and kills them with it.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de ma he dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / skyugs ba za ba la sogs pa'i nang du skye zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de ma he dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / skyugs ba za ba la sogs pa'i nang du skye zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur /
translated: If he escapes from there, he may be born among the animals. He will be born as an ox, a horse, a cow, a pig, or something similar, and will have a long life.

original: bdog pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag kyang mthu chung ngur gyur pas gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: bdog pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag kyang mthu chung ngur gyur pas gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do //
translated: Whatever possessions he has will be taken away by others, because he is weak.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na /
translated: If he escapes from there, he may be born with the general lot in life of a human.

original: de tshe thung zhing dbul ba dang / de'i chung ma'ang gzhan gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de tshe thung zhing dbul ba dang / de'i chung ma'ang gzhan gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have a short life and be poor, and others will steal his wife.

original: de'i las kyi rtsig ngos dag la gzugs brnyan bris pa 'di lta bu'ang snang ste /
analyzed: de'i las kyi rtsig ngos dag la gzugs brnyan bris pa 'di lta bu'ang snang ste /
translated: The images of his past actions will appear on the walls of the prison,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: as follows:

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod 'khor dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu sngar bstan pa bzhin snang ngo //
translated: The results of the actions that manifest in the great hell of Screams and its surrounding hells are as described above.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: “If one escapes from there, one may be born among the pretas.

original: de rtag tu tshe ring ba nyid du 'gyur zhing las de smin par 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin dam pa chad pa'i sa'am; khab mgrin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rtag tu tshe ring ba nyid du 'gyur zhing las de smin par 'gyur ba ji lta ba bzhin dam pa chad pa'i sa'am; khab mgrin rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One will then have an extremely long life, and one will be born among the pretas who are deprived of food and drink, or among the pretas with needle-like throats, in accordance with the ripening of one’s actions.

original: de rang bzhin gyis bkres pas nyam thag cing rang gi chung ma gang yin pa de gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: de rang bzhin gyis bkres pas nyam thag cing rang gi chung ma gang yin pa de gzhan dag gis 'phrog par byed do //
translated: One will be tormented by hunger and thirst, and one’s wife will be carried off by others.

original: de gal te'ang rgyags pa'i tshul dang / rgyags pa'i rgyus dug za bar byed la /
analyzed: de gal te'ang rgyags pa'i tshul dang / rgyags pa'i rgyus dug za bar byed la /
translated: If one eats poison out of a desire for intoxication,

original: de dug gi me mi bzad pas sreg par byed do //
analyzed: de dug gi me mi bzad pas sreg par byed do //
translated: one will be burned by the unbearable fire of poison.

original: de las thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi @333b nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de las thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi @333b nang du skyes na /
translated: If one escapes from there, one may be born among the animals.

original: de phan tshun za ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par nyams par 'gyur /
analyzed: de phan tshun za ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par nyams par 'gyur /
translated: One will be tormented by the suffering of mutual predation.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If, after being free from that hell, they should be born among the gods,

original: de las de dang rgyu mthun par bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs dman zhing tshe thung pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed par 'chi ba dang / de'i lus la rin po che btags pa'ang 'od mi gsal ba dang /
analyzed: de las de dang rgyu mthun par bong skyed dang / mdog dang / dbyibs dman zhing tshe thung pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi g-yul 'gyed par 'chi ba dang / de'i lus la rin po che btags pa'ang 'od mi gsal ba dang /
translated: in accordance with their causal actions, they will have a small body, a bad color, and a bad shape. They will have a short life, and they will die in a battle between the gods and the demigods. Even if they wear jewels on their bodies, they will not shine.

original: de'i lha mo'ang gus par mi nyan zhing gzhan du 'gro ba dang / de'i bdud rtsi'ang ro chung ba dang / blo zhan pa dang / sems g-yengs pa dang / de la lha gzhan rnams kyis gnod par byed do //
analyzed: de'i lha mo'ang gus par mi nyan zhing gzhan du 'gro ba dang / de'i bdud rtsi'ang ro chung ba dang / blo zhan pa dang / sems g-yengs pa dang / de la lha gzhan rnams kyis gnod par byed do //
translated: Their goddesses will not listen to them and will go elsewhere. Their nectar will have little taste. They will be of little intelligence, their minds will be distracted, and the other gods will harm them.

original: de nas yang brgya byin de dang / lha de rnams dang lhan cig las kyi rtsig ngos de dag nyid la rtog par byed de /
analyzed: de nas yang brgya byin de dang / lha de rnams dang lhan cig las kyi rtsig ngos de dag nyid la rtog par byed de /
translated: “Then Śakra and the gods will continue to examine the wall of karma.

original: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'khor dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'khor dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu sngar bstan pa bzhin mthong ngo //
translated: They will see the results of the actions of the beings in the hell of Screams and its neighboring regions, as previously explained.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na snga ma bzhin du 'gyur la /
translated: If he escapes from there, if he is born among the hungry ghosts, it will be as before.

original: khyad par du 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par du 'byung ba ni /
translated: The particular result is that

original: de gang dang / gang du 'gro ba de dang / der lce bcad cing bcad cing skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gang dang / gang du 'gro ba de dang / der lce bcad cing bcad cing skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: wherever he goes, his tongue will be cut off and will grow back again.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If he escapes from there, if he is born among the animals,

original: de bya gong ma sreg dang / sreg pa dang / ka ra ka bha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bya gong ma sreg dang / sreg pa dang / ka ra ka bha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur la /
translated: he will be born as a partridge, a quail, or a karambha bird.

original: brdzun du smra ba de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi skad phyung pa nyid kyis gsod par byed do //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba de dang rgyu mthun par rang gi skad phyung pa nyid kyis gsod par byed do //
translated: In accordance with the cause of lying, he will be killed by the sound of his own voice.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If he escapes from there, if he is born among humans,

original: de'i las kyi 'bras bu snga ma dang mthun @334a *//
analyzed: de'i las kyi 'bras bu snga ma dang mthun @334a *//
translated: in accordance with the previous result of his action,

original: par tshigs gzung bar 'os par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par tshigs gzung bar 'os par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: he will not be worthy of being praised.

original: de nas thar nas kyang gal te legs par byas pa'i las kyis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: de nas thar nas kyang gal te legs par byas pa'i las kyis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If he escapes from there, if he is born among the gods through good karma,

original: de brdzun du smras pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun par sgra mi snyan pa'am /
analyzed: de brdzun du smras pa'i las de dang rgyu mthun par sgra mi snyan pa'am /
translated: In accordance with the cause, the act of lying, he will be born in Kuru or

original: glu blang bar mi nus pa'am /
analyzed: glu blang bar mi nus pa'am /
translated: he will be unable to sing,

original: skad gag gag po'am /
analyzed: skad gag gag po'am /
translated: he will have a stammer,

original: lha kun gyi nang na tshigs bzung bar mi 'os pa dang / ji ltar lha gzhan dag smra ba de ltar mngon par brjod pa legs par sbyar ba shin tu yid du 'ong bar smra mi nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha kun gyi nang na tshigs bzung bar mi 'os pa dang / ji ltar lha gzhan dag smra ba de ltar mngon par brjod pa legs par sbyar ba shin tu yid du 'ong bar smra mi nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: or he will be unable to speak well, with well-formed words that are as pleasing to the ear as the songs of the other gods.

original: de nas yang brgya byin de sems can dmyal ba tsha ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la sngar bstan pa bzhin rtog par byed do //
analyzed: de nas yang brgya byin de sems can dmyal ba tsha ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la sngar bstan pa bzhin rtog par byed do //
translated: Then Śakra will examine the results of actions related to the hot hells, as previously described.

original: de las thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na ljan ljin spyod pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las thar nas gal te yi dvags rnams kyi nang du skyes na ljan ljin spyod pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: If, after being freed from there, he is born among the pretas, he will be born among the filthy pretas.

original: de snga ma bzhin du lnga 'gyur gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de snga ma bzhin du lnga 'gyur gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As before, he will suffer five times more.

original: gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de rgya mtsho'i chu srin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du skyes na de rgya mtsho'i chu srin du 'gyur ro //
translated: If he is born among the animals, he will be born as a sea monster.

original: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na bzhin mi sdug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na bzhin mi sdug par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are born among humans, they will be ugly.

original: de nas yang thar nas gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na de snga ma bzhin smad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas yang thar nas gal te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes na de snga ma bzhin smad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are born among the gods, they will be despised as before.

original: rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dag ni lha rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis shi bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas /
analyzed: rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dag ni lha rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis shi bar gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas /
translated: The ripening of the karma of the Extremely Hot and Unrelenting Hells is such that it would not be right for the gods to die merely by seeing them.

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po de gnyis kyi 'jigs pa dag sbrul pa ma mdzad de /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po de gnyis kyi 'jigs pa dag sbrul pa ma mdzad de /
translated: Therefore, the Buddha did not manifest the terrors of those two great hells.

original: lha yul rnams su sems can dmyal ba de @334b gnyis kyi skye ba sprul pa ma mdzad do ////
analyzed: lha yul rnams su sems can dmyal ba de @334b gnyis kyi skye ba sprul pa ma mdzad do ////
translated: He did not manifest the births of those two hells among the gods.

original: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
translated: The Noble Recollection of the True Dharma

original: bam po sum cu rtsa dgu pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa dgu pa /
translated: Chapter Thirty-Nine

original: de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams mngon par mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
analyzed: de nas brgya byin gyis lha de rnams mngon par mthong nas 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
translated: Then Śakra, having seen those gods, spoke this verse:

original: ji ltar phyag dar rnams la rlung //

translated: “When the good karma

translated: Even if they were to be born and die a hundred or

analyzed: gzhan la mi gnod pa /

analyzed: de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams byed pa yin no //

analyzed: dad pa dang ldan pa /

analyzed: rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa ma yin pas /

analyzed: de nas cung zad phub ma tsam yang len par mi byed na de ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no //

original: srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spangs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it that he has abandoned killing?

analyzed: 'di la srog chags rkang brgya ba kha gnyis yod pa rgyas bzung bdag gsod par mi byed la /

analyzed: yid la'ang sdig pa sems par mi byed pa dang / seng ge dang / stag rgyu ba'i sa dag tu de dag gsad par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: rngon pa de rnams kyis rnyi btsugs na rngon pa de rnams la nor rdzas byin nas /

analyzed: yid la gcugs par byed cing gzhan dag kyang dge ba de nyid la sbyor bar byed /

original: rab tu 'jog par byed /
analyzed: rab tu 'jog par byed /

analyzed: de ltar srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu de ni dge ba'i las rnams la dmigs shing /

translated: They will accomplish their goals, all their wishes will be fulfilled, their faces will be radiant, and the gods will worship them.

translated: These are the effects of their actions that will manifest in this life.

original: legs par byas @337a *//
analyzed: legs par byas @337a *//
translated: Later, when they separate from their bodies, they will go to the joyful higher realms and be born among the gods in the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

analyzed: pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha mig phye ba dang btsums te 'gro ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “Those who have engaged in the thirty-three types of positive action will be born in the realm of the gods who open and close their eyes to move.

original: der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyis mtha' shin tu brgyan pa de'i nyams dga' ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyis mtha' shin tu brgyan pa de'i nyams dga' ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni /
translated: “When they are born there, the gods will be adorned with the most exquisite ornaments and will enjoy the most delightful abodes.

original: mi thams cad kyi bsam pas bsam par yang mi nus te /
analyzed: mi thams cad kyi bsam pas bsam par yang mi nus te /
translated: No human being can even imagine what these abodes are like.

original: der skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “The gods will be born there.

original: lha de rang gi 'od dang / bde ba mchog dang ldan la /
analyzed: lha de rang gi 'od dang / bde ba mchog dang ldan la /
translated: They will possess their own light and supreme bliss.

analyzed: sha dang / rus pa dang / chu ser dang bral ba / 'gran zla 'jigs pa gzhan dang bral ba /

analyzed: kun tu 'tshol ba'i 'jigs pa dag bral ba /

original: ser sna dang bral ba /
analyzed: ser sna dang bral ba /

analyzed: mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang bral ba /

analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus de ma gtogs par dus de la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
translated: Except for the time of death, they will be free from the fear of illness.

original: gnod pa'i 'jig pa dag bral ba /
analyzed: gnod pa'i 'jig pa dag bral ba /
translated: They will be free from the fear of harm.

original: nad dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: nad dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
translated: They will be free from the fear of illness and death.

original: rga ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: rga ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba /
translated: They are free from the fear of aging.

original: rab tu bag med pa dus de srid du shin tu nyams dga' ba thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: rab tu bag med pa dus de srid du shin tu nyams dga' ba thams cad mthong ste /
translated: They are extremely careless and see all the delightful things there for that long.

original: mtho ris kyi bde ba la 'chums pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gcig tu yid du 'ong ba /
analyzed: mtho ris kyi bde ba la 'chums pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga gcig tu yid du 'ong ba /
translated: They are attached to the pleasures of the higher realms and the five sense objects are completely delightful.

original: yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnams kyis gzhal med khang gser dang / beed'urya dang / nor bu'i lan kan bres pa'i gzhal med khang dkrigs pa /
analyzed: yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnams kyis gzhal med khang gser dang / beed'urya dang / nor bu'i lan kan bres pa'i gzhal med khang dkrigs pa /
translated: In the celestial palaces, which are adorned with golden, beryl, and jeweled railings, they experience many kinds of sense pleasures.

original: gzhan dag na shing ljon pa dang / nye ba'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag na shing ljon pa dang / nye ba'i tshal rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa /
translated: In other places there are various kinds of trees and parks.

original: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma'i rdzing rnams kyi nang na bya ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / ka randa pas brgyan cing rma bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa ri'i sman ljongs rnams @337b na bya sna tshogs kyis bstan pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna bdun gyi padma'i rdzing rnams kyi nang na bya ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / ka randa pas brgyan cing rma bya myos pa sgra 'byin pa ri'i sman ljongs rnams @337b na bya sna tshogs kyis bstan pa /
translated: In the pools of lotuses made of the seven precious substances, there are geese, ducks, and karandavas. The intoxicated peacocks sing. The mountain valleys are filled with various birds.

original: ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo rnams na'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi 'byung khungs kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo rnams na'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi 'byung khungs kyis brgyan pa /
translated: On the peaks of Mount Sumeru there are the sources of the seven precious substances.

original: lteng ka rnams kyi nang na gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig gi bye ma bdal ba dang / ri rab kyi sman ljongs rnams kyi nang na'ang rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: lteng ka rnams kyi nang na gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig gi bye ma bdal ba dang / ri rab kyi sman ljongs rnams kyi nang na'ang rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa /
translated: The pools are covered with golden, silver, and pearl sand, and the valleys of Mount Meru are adorned with trees of various jewels.

original: shing ljon pa rnams kyang nyi ma ltar gsal ba /
analyzed: shing ljon pa rnams kyang nyi ma ltar gsal ba /
translated: The trees are radiant like the sun.

original: ri khrod tshang tshing dag na'ang gser dang / bee d'urya'i lcug ma'i tshogs 'phyang zhing /
analyzed: ri khrod tshang tshing dag na'ang gser dang / bee d'urya'i lcug ma'i tshogs 'phyang zhing /
translated: In the thickets of the mountains hang clusters of golden and beryl vines.

original: me tog gi lcug ma 'phyang bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: me tog gi lcug ma 'phyang bas brgyan pa /
translated: They are adorned with hanging vines of flowers.

original: byung ba'i bum gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: byung ba'i bum gyis brgyan pa /
translated: They are adorned with vases of abundance.

original: ri rab kyi phug pa nams kyang rin po che bzang pos brgyan pa /
analyzed: ri rab kyi phug pa nams kyang rin po che bzang pos brgyan pa /
translated: The caves of Mount Meru are adorned with fine jewels.

original: rdo leb dang / sa'i phyogs cha mtho dma' ran pa /
analyzed: rdo leb dang / sa'i phyogs cha mtho dma' ran pa /
translated: The rocks and the ground are at a comfortable height.

original: ri'i zom rnams kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing rdo leb kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: ri'i zom rnams kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing rdo leb kyis brgyan pa /
translated: The mountain peaks are adorned with various jewels and rocks.

original: me tog dri zhim po rgya cher dbyangs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: me tog dri zhim po rgya cher dbyangs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They are adorned with the sweet scent of flowers.

original: rang gi bsam pas brgyan pa bas kyang ches lhag cing /
analyzed: rang gi bsam pas brgyan pa bas kyang ches lhag cing /
translated: It is even more delightful than one’s own thoughts.

original: nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs snying dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs snying dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan yang /
translated: It is a delightful place, and it is also

original: gad ka dang / dgon pa dag na shing ljon pa rab tu 'bar ba lta bus brgyan pa /
analyzed: gad ka dang / dgon pa dag na shing ljon pa rab tu 'bar ba lta bus brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with trees that blaze like fire in the ravines and the wilderness.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa 'bum gyis mdzes par byas pa /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa 'bum gyis mdzes par byas pa /
translated: It is beautified by hundreds of thousands of wish-fulfilling trees.

original: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyod pa /
analyzed: rang gis byas pa'i las kyi mtha' la spyod pa /
translated: One experiences the consequences of one’s own actions.

original: lha dang / lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba /🔽rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgras rna ba tshim par byed cing /
analyzed: lha dang / lha mo 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba / rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgras rna ba tshim par byed cing /
translated: One is surrounded by hundreds of thousands of gods and goddesses.🔽One’s ears are satisfied by the sounds of music and cymbals.

original: pi wang gi sgra yongs su 'byin par byed pa de rnams na rtse bar byed do //
analyzed: pi wang gi sgra yongs su 'byin par byed pa de rnams na rtse bar byed do //
translated: One plays and enjoys oneself, and the sounds of the vīṇā are heard.

original: des gang dang / gang mthong ba de dang / de nyid yid du 'ong @338a *//🔽la; gang mnyam pa de nyid snyan cing 'dzebs la yid du 'ong ba /
analyzed: des gang dang / gang mthong ba de dang / de nyid yid du 'ong @338a *// la; gang mnyam pa de nyid snyan cing 'dzebs la yid du 'ong ba /
translated: Whatever one sees is delightful.🔽Whatever one hears is pleasant, agreeable, and delightful.

original: gang bsnams pa de nyid dri shin tu zhim zhing yon tan du ma dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gang bsnams pa de nyid dri shin tu zhim zhing yon tan du ma dang ldan pa /
translated: Whatever one smells is fragrant and has many good qualities.

original: gang myangs pa'i ro de nyid yon tan du ma dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gang myangs pa'i ro de nyid yon tan du ma dang ldan pa /
translated: The taste of the nectar has many qualities.

original: gang reg pa de nyid bde zhing 'jam la 'dod cing yid du 'ong ba /
analyzed: gang reg pa de nyid bde zhing 'jam la 'dod cing yid du 'ong ba /
translated: The touch is pleasant, soft, desirable, and delightful.

original: gang yid la bsams pa de nyid myur du thob cing 'gyur ba med la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gang yid la bsams pa de nyid myur du thob cing 'gyur ba med la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa /
translated: Whatever one thinks of will be quickly obtained, without change, and with all good qualities.

original: thun mong ma yin pa gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa gzhan gyis 'phrog par mi nus pa yin no //
translated: It is not shared and cannot be taken away by others.

original: de nas lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de /
analyzed: de nas lha 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba de /
translated: Then, surrounded by hundreds of thousands of gods,

original: lha'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyi nang na yongs su spyod pa na; res dga' de dus ston gyi tshigs zhes bya ba 'dod pa kun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: lha'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyi nang na yongs su spyod pa na; res dga' de dus ston gyi tshigs zhes bya ba 'dod pa kun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis brgyan pa /
translated: he will enjoy himself among the other gods in the forest known as Enjoying the Past, which is adorned with trees that grant all desires.

original: 'bab chu'i tshogs brgya snyed kyis gang ba /
analyzed: 'bab chu'i tshogs brgya snyed kyis gang ba /
translated: The forest is filled with hundreds of waterfalls

original: padma'i rdzing du mas rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: padma'i rdzing du mas rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: and is adorned with many lotus ponds.

original: lha 'bum snyed du mas bsten bsten pa /
analyzed: lha 'bum snyed du mas bsten bsten pa /
translated: It is frequented by hundreds of thousands of gods

original: bee d'urya'i lcug ma 'phyang bas bskor ba /
analyzed: bee d'urya'i lcug ma 'phyang bas bskor ba /
translated: and surrounded by hanging vines of beryl.

original: gzhal med khang gi rtse mo la bya skad 'byin pa 'bum snyed kyis bskor cing nyams dga' bar byed pa'i ri de la 'dzeg par byed do //
analyzed: gzhal med khang gi rtse mo la bya skad 'byin pa 'bum snyed kyis bskor cing nyams dga' bar byed pa'i ri de la 'dzeg par byed do //
translated: The peak of the palace is surrounded by hundreds of thousands of birds that sing delightfully.

original: de nas legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de nyams dga' ba'i ri'i zom de na bde ba myong bar byed de /
analyzed: de nas legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de nyams dga' ba'i ri'i zom de na bde ba myong bar byed de /
translated: “Thus, those who have engaged in positive actions will experience pleasure on the delightful mountain peak.

original: legs par byas pa'i las kyi rin gyis nyos pa rnams ni 'dod rgyal las ma byung /
analyzed: legs par byas pa'i las kyi rin gyis nyos pa rnams ni 'dod rgyal las ma byung /
translated: The pleasures they enjoy are purchased with the currency of positive actions. They are not due to chance,

original: gzhan gyis ma byas /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma byas /
translated: nor are they created by others.

original: gzhan nas ma 'ongs /
analyzed: gzhan nas ma 'ongs /
translated: They do not come from anywhere else.

original: nyams pa ma yin /
analyzed: nyams pa ma yin /
translated: They are not lost.

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa @338b mgu nas byin pa ma yin pa de dag la de 'dzegs nas ri'i zom de na /
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa @338b mgu nas byin pa ma yin pa de dag la de 'dzegs nas ri'i zom de na /
translated: They are not given by a pleased Īśvara, and so forth.

original: bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa du ma 'bum snyed kyis kun tu gang zhing /
analyzed: bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i lha dang / lha mo'i tshogs rnam pa du ma 'bum snyed kyis kun tu gang zhing /
translated: When the gods climb the mountain peak, they find that it is filled with hundreds of thousands of gods and goddesses who are all of the same radiance as themselves.

original: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag dga' bar byed cing /
analyzed: sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag dga' bar byed cing /
translated: They enjoy themselves to the tunes of the five types of instruments.
